entry.name: minlength
entry.title: minlength method
entry.desc: Makes the element require a given minimum length.
entry.longdesc:
Return false if the element is
some kind of text input and its value is too short
a set of checkboxes and doesn't have enough boxes checked
a select and doesn't have enough options selected
Works with text inputs, selects and checkboxes.

example.desc: Makes "field" required having at least 3 characters.
